comments: Trent Jr. (TOR) firms up in Miller's (CHA) path and marginal contact occurs as they come together during the pick.
Bertans (CHA) extends his leg out and makes intentional foot to ball contact.
Bertans (CHA) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Miller (CHA) jumps from point A to point B and initiates contact with Barrett (TOR), which affects his driving shot attempt.
Trent Jr. (TOR) brings his arm toward the ball and some contact occurs with Bridges' (CHA) wrist during his attempt to crossover and change directions.
Olynyk (TOR) is slightly delayed in firming up on his left foot and marginal side to side contact occurs with Bertans (CHA) as he dribbles around Olynyk at the start of the drive.
Williams (CHA) is in the lane for less than three seconds prior to the ball being touched by a defender.
Olynyk (TOR) moves alongside Micic's (CHA) path and maintains a legal guarding position before cleanly blocking the driving shot attempt.
Quickley (TOR) pursues the rebound and marginal contact occurs as he slides his hand off Williams' (CHA) arm prior to the start of Williams' upward shooting motion.
Miller (CHA) and Olynyk (TOR) come together at the same spot and marginal contact occurs as they both move up the court.
Olynyk (TOR) establishes himself in Miller's (CHA) path and absorbs the marginal contact before lifting his arm to disengage from the pick.
Williams (CHA) fails to establish a legal guarding position and initiates contact with Quickley's (TOR) body, which affects his driving shot attempt.
Miller (CHA) establishes himself in Barrett's (TOR) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Olynyk (TOR) legally contests Bridges' (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Bertans (CHA) moves laterally into Quickley's (TOR) path and initiates body contact that affects Quickley's SQBR on the perimeter.
Trent Jr. (TOR) legally contests Bertans' (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Olynyk (TOR) and Williams (CHA) mutually engage and disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Williams (CHA) initiates body contact to Quickley (TOR) and dislodges him from his position after securing the rebound.
Williams (CHA) is late to establish himself in Agbaji's (TOR) path and does not give the necessary time or distance for Agbaji to avoid the contact.
Trent Jr. (TOR) grasps and then quickly releases Miller's (CHA) jersey, which does not affect Miller's ability to cleanly retrieve the inbound pass.
Bertans (CHA) is not vertical and initiates contact with Trent Jr.'s (TOR) arm during the pass attempt.
Trent Jr. (TOR) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Micic (CHA).
